channel.title: Fixed-rsses on Random Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Fixed-rsses on Random Blog

item.title: about
item.description:
My name is Toni Piz√†. I’m a developer with a wide range of interests, mainly involved in algorithmics, distributed systems and machine learning. I have a bachelor’s degree in Computer Science by the University of the Balearic Islands (UIB), and I have coursed a master degree in Computing by the Polytechnic University of Catalonia (UPC). Unfortunately, due to a variety of personal problems, I haven’t finished my master thesis.

I worked as a backend developer and devops engineer. Currently i’m starting a new path in the data science field, with special emphasis in machine learning.

This blog is an attempt to improve my written expression in english. Also, putting down my ideas is a good way to structurate them, and the public exposure can be useful to recolect feedback of people with more experience than me. I will appreciate any comment, correction and improvement to the opinions exposed in this blog.
